name: Larry Ladybug Lost in Space
description:
Larry the Ladybug got lost in space and has to defeat enemys now!

This is a submussion for the Bullet Hell Jam 2022 !

The shop is still very buggy! I am sorry for that, I had little time for bug fixing!

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Space to dash
  • Left mouse button to shoot
  • Mousewheel to change weapon

Credits:

  • J.st -Music
  • Rolando Gomez
  • Fatal Exit
  • Tallbeard Studios
  • NicoleMarieT
